projects.text: A PROJECT IS COMPLETE WHEN IT STARTS WORKING FOR YOU, RATHER THAN YOU WORKING FOR IT.

project.heading: A Blogging Website for travellers
project.title: Nomadic
text: Designed, built and deployed a MERN stack-based web application to store and explore travel Blogs.
Implemented email login using JWT and OAuth Google login for user authentication.
Set up database with Mongo DB Atlas to store users, post and implement its edit, upvote and delete functionality.
project.Used: Used: React, Node, Express, MongoDB (mongoose, Atlas), Redux.

project.heading: browsering timelapses
project.title: Timeflux
text: Developed a React application to explore slow Mo and Time-Lapse videos.
Set up database with Firebase to store information of user, posts and comments.

project.heading: Localify
project.title: Grocery Delivery App
text: Developed application to find nearby stores and their real time stock
The app allowed users to order groceries from the nearby stores

project.heading: Visulization of algorithm
project.title: CPU Scheduling Algorithm App
text: Solve problems of CPU Scheduling algorithm, solution will show you which process is at which state at every point of time.
It helps to understand how CPU Scheduling algorithms works.
